entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NATIVEAOT] lld duplicate symbol compilation error when building for linux-bionic-arm #100191
  • xcode-select : error : tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode - new error with nativeaot in .NET 9 preview 2 #100189
  • A Bug when DispatchProxy.Create #100188
  • [NativeAOT/macos-arm64] System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests fail with exit code 138 #100175
  • at GC_Regressions._v2_0_beta2_452950_452950_452950_._v2_0_beta2_452950_452950_452950_cmd() #100174

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Metadata not trimmed for nested Interface types when compiling TerraFx.Interop.Windows #66716
    Future
  • After upgrade to 8.0.0, setting AOT compilation to true breaks published Blazor app on Windows 10 if using LazyLoaded references #96004
    8.0.x
  • How to release dll load by mono? #100136
  • [wasm][debugger] Timeout waiting for CheckInspectLocalsAtBreakpointSite #91773
    9.0.0
  • Test failed: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_22888/test22888 #13703
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Build win-x86 NativeAOT runtime pack #100195
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix double definition of RhGetCurrentThunkContext on linux-bionic-arm #100192
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use clang --version to get Apple toolset version #100190
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix HalfNumberBufferLength #100187
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Optimize DWARF encoding for empty frames on linux-arm64 #100183
    arch-arm64, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][wbt] Debug InnerSendMessageToServerAsync #100182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Optimize BigInteger formatting #100181
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate header Separator logic #100179
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Move a few allocations behind IsHttp3Supported checks #100178
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Cache more info on HttpMethod #100177
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Convert most of variant to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Populate JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider in the source generator. #100173
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Delete RequiresProcessIsolation on some tests #100172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update VS install requirements to bump Windows 10 SDK version #100170
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100168
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Trim unused interfaces #100000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add JitOptRepeat configuration options #100154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Ascii API in HttpConnection.WriteAsciiString #100180
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for struct returns from Swift reverse pinvokes #100091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix unbound MAC work in GetCertContentType #100163
    area-System.Security
  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • Remove more Helper Method Frames #100116
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clear m_nodeToLoopMemoryBlockMap when preparing to repeat optimizations #100164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable nogcregion #100167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete unused ThreadStore::m_maxThreadCount #100171
    area-VM-coreclr
  • LogicalName added for EmbeddedResource #99999
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100050
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a uniform representation for parameter ABI information #100138
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Prevent hoisting nodes with order side effects #100160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • JIT: initial work on general count reconstruction #99992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] handle exceptions #100148
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] disable jiterp #100156
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview3] Revert #99140 #100147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Optimize (typedef|table|declsec)_locator metadata loading #100157
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Support setting NamedPipeClientStream.ReadMode with PipeAccessRights ctor overload #100001
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
